Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start


More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

### Deploy to remote sites

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: hexo+github
Post._content:
# hexo+github

,,,,,,,.
github pages.

#github pages
github,github pages,github repository yourname.github.io,	masteryourname.github.io.
html,.
.
:github pages.

html.,,markdown,markdown.
,hexo,,.

#github pages
github pages.
[](https://pages.github.com/ "GitHub Pages")

#gitnodejs
windowgitnodejs
git [git](https://git-scm.com/download/)
nodejs:[nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/)

cmd

``` bash
git --version
node -v
npm -v
```
![](/img/hexo20150701016.png)

#hexo
hexonode.jsGitHub
test
>hexogithub

###
hexoNPM
testgit bash

>`npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org`
###hexo
cnpmhexo
>`cnpm install -g hexo-cli`


>`cnpm install hexo --save`


>`hexo -v`

#hexo
###hexo
>`hexo init`
###
>`cnpm install`
###hexo
>` hexo s -g`


>`http://localhost:4000`

#hexo github pages 

###github pages
test
![](/img/hexo20170211162714.png)
_config.yml hexo
_config.yml:keyvalue

```bash
title: 
subtitle: 
description: 
author: 
language: zh-Hans
timezone: Asia/Shanghai

# URL 
##  http://yoursite.com/blog url  http://yoursite.com/blog  root  /blog/
url: http://tengj.github.io
root: /
permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/
permalink_defaults:

# Directory 
source_dir: source     #
public_dir: public     #
tag_dir: tags         #
archive_dir: archives     #
category_dir: categories #
code_dir: downloads/code #nclude code 
i18n_dir: :lang         #i18n
skip_render:         # glob 

# Writing 
new_post_name: :title.md # 
default_layout: post     # 
titlecase: false # Transform title into titlecase
external_link: true # true
filename_case: 0    #120
render_drafts: false  #_draftsfalse
post_asset_folder: false # Asset 
relative_link: false    #false
future: true        #false
highlight:    #
  enable: true
  line_number: true
  auto_detect: false
  tab_replace:

# Category & Tag 
default_category: uncategorized        #
category_map:                #
tag_map:                #

# Date / Time format
## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date
## You can customize the date format as defined in
## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/
date_format: YYYY-MM-DD
time_format: HH:mm:ss

# Pagination 
## Set per_page to 0 to disable pagination
per_page: 10    # (0 = )
pagination_dir: page    #

#https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/wiki/Themes
theme: next

# Deployment
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html

#git
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: git@github.com:yourname/yourname.github.io.git
  branch: master

```

deploygithub pagesgit

#

###

>`hexo new "hello"`

/test/source/_posts/ hello.md

```bash
---
title: hello
date: 2015-07-01 22:37:23
categories:
  - 
  - 
tags:
  - hello
---

:
<!--more-->
:

```

###
deploy
*
>`npm install hexo-deployer-git --save`

*
> `hexo d -g`

* http//yourname.github.io

####git keygen
gitkeygen

*keygen
>`ssh-keygen -t rsa -C '@youremail.com'`


```bash
    1C:\Users\Administrator\.ssh\id_rsa.pub

    2github Account Settings>SSH Public keys > add another public keys

    3key  add key ok

```

#

[http://blog.csdn.net/jzooo/article/details/46781805](http://blog.csdn.net/jzooo/article/details/46781805)
[http://www.cnfeat.com/blog/2014/05/10/how-to-build-a-blog/](http://www.cnfeat.com/blog/2014/05/10/how-to-build-a-blog/)
[http://www.ezlippi.com/blog/2016/02/jekyll-to-hexo.html](http://www.ezlippi.com/blog/2016/02/jekyll-to-hexo.html)
[https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/)
